summary: This is the official verdict form from the criminal trial of Ghislaine Maxwell in the Southern District of New York. It lists the three counts against her: conspiracy to transport a minor, conspiracy to commit sex trafficking, and sex trafficking, and requires the jury foreperson to record the unanimous verdict for each count.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal trial, facing three counts related to sex trafficking and transportation of a minor.

events.title: Verdict Form Signed
events.description: The jury foreperson signs the verdict form in the criminal trial of Ghislaine Maxwell, recording the jury's unanimous verdict on three counts.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was charged with three criminal counts: Conspiracy to Transport a Minor in Interstate and Foreign Commerce, Conspiracy to Commit Sex Trafficking, and Sex Trafficking.
The verdict form requires a unanimous jury decision for each count, indicating the trial has concluded and the jury has reached a verdict.
The document is dated September 25, 2021, and signed by the jury foreperson in New York, New York.
The document is part of the official court record from the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York.
